attributes.action: reintroduce the Guest Beer Legislation to give drinker choice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Guest Beer legislation should be reintroduced and be inplimented by Pubco's and Breweries with with over 120 public houses or licensed premises.
Pubs licensees should be able to select at least one guest beer free of tie from a Regional Beer List and a National Beer list if their premises sells over 3 barrels of cask beer per week.
